    • Constructor Detail

      • TFIDFItemScorer

        @Inject
public TFIDFItemScorer(org.lenskit.data.dao.UserEventDAO uedao,
                               TFIDFModel m,
                               UserProfileBuilder upb)
        Construct a new item scorer. LensKit's dependency injector will call this constructor and provide the appropriate parameters.
        Parameters:
        uedao - The user-event DAO, so we can fetch a user's ratings when scoring items for them.
        m - The precomputed model containing the item tag vectors.
        upb - The user profile builder for building user tag profiles.

    • Method Detail

      • scoreWithDetails

        public org.lenskit.api.ResultMap scoreWithDetails(long user,
                                                  @Nonnull
                                                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Generate item scores personalized for a particular user. For the TFIDF scorer, this will prepare a user profile and compare it to item tag vectors to produce the score.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to score for.
        items - A collection of item ids that should be scored.
